org.xbill.DNS
Class Master

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xbill.DNS.Master
public class Master
extends Object

A DNS master file parser. This incrementally parses the file, returning one record at a time. When directives are seen, they are added to the state and used when parsing future records.

Constructor Summary
Master(String filename)
          Begins parsing the specified file

          Returns the next record in the master file

readExtendedLine

public static String readExtendedLine(BufferedReader br)
                               throws IOException
Reads a line using the master file format. Removes all data following a semicolon and uses parentheses as line continuation markers.
Parameters:
br - The BufferedReader supplying the data
Returns:
A String representing the normalized line
